title: Twice the Malone
description: She’d never had a one-night stand in her life . . .Until the night she met them.Gorgeous. Seductive. Charming. And wild.So she threw caution to the wind and had one crazy, hot night with two men she’d never see again.Yeah. Turns out, she didn’t have that sort of luck. What she had were two Malone men. One = wanted to devour her, the other wanted to destroy her.Scarlett Jean is a woman in trouble.Welcome to the world of the Malones. They’re crazy, wild, charming, and they will take you on a crazy ride. This book is mfm with sexy scenes, domineering, protective men and spanking.
author: Laylah Roberts
